articles.title: This denomination saw the highest increase in counterfeit notes in FY22 - Economic Times
articles.description: The RBI detected an increase of 10.7% in counterfeit notes of Indian denominations in FY22. A total of 6.9 percent of fake denominations were detected at the Reserve Bank and the rest 93.1 percent at other banks.
